attributes.action: MP's should be subjected to lie detector questioning
attributes.additional_details:
All MP's should be asked the following questions in conjunction with the use of lie detector equipment.
1/ Have you ever lied to or misled the electorate and or Parliament.
2/ Have you ever submitted expenses claims that you know or believe to be fraudulent or otherwise spurious.
3/ Have you ever received any inappropriate payment as a result of your position.
4/ Can you be trusted to be honest and truthful.
The results to be made public, so the people can decide how best to vote.
